content: I'm currently trying to set up zulip with multiple realms, but I don't have the ability to set up a wildcard DNS or anything similar (I only have my one subdomain, that's it). Is it possible to serve multiple realms from a single server and a single domain ?
I have been reading this documentation: https://zulip.readthedocs.io/en/latest/production/multiple-organizations.html but it's still not totally clear if it is possible or what I need to do
though the statement "Most Zulip servers host a single Zulip organization on the root domain" implies that it is possible to host more than one on the root domain
I indeed will not have any cross-user usage, all realms will have unique users
Nope, Zulip requires a different hostname for each organization. (The point of that statement is that most servers host one organization.)
Can I ask why you don't have the ability to set up wildcard dns? This has been made a lot easier with LetsEncrypt.
